name: py-qiskit-terra
description:
Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the
level of extended quantum circuits, operators, and algorithms.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-contextvars
dependencies.description:
This package implements a backport of Python 3.7 contextvars module (see
PEP 567) for Python 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-retworkx
dependencies.description: A high performance Python graph library implemented in Rust.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-sympy
dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.

dependencies.name: py-fastjsonschema
dependencies.description: Fast JSON schema validator for Python.

dependencies.name: py-python-constraint
dependencies.description: Constraint Solving Problem resolver for Python

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-symengine
dependencies.description: Python wrappers for SymEngine, a symbolic manipulation library.

dependencies.name: py-tweedledum
dependencies.description:
tweedledum is a library for synthesis, compilation, and optimization of
quantum circuits. The library is written to be scalable up to problem
sizes in which quantum circuits outperform classical ones. Also, it is
meant to be used both independently and alongside established tools.

dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-aer
dependent_to.description:
Aer is a high performance simulator for quantum circuits that includes
noise models
